bibl.title: A Roman Shroud and its Demotic Inscriptions in the Museum of Fine Arts, Boston.
bibl.note: Accession No. 54.993. The decoration includes both Egyptian scenes and a naturalistic portrait of the deceased woman. Assiout, perhaps first century A.D. (an alternative to the Severan date recently accepted).
RIGGS Christina and Martin Andreas STADLER, A Roman Shroud and its Demotic Inscriptions in the Museum of Fine Arts, Boston.
